dcterms:creator: D. Pathak
P. Krähenbühl
T. Darrell
dcterms:description: The ISIC 2016 training dataset was used to annotate the presence or absence of eight structural patterns in skin lesions, providing weak labels for training a convolutional neural network for segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: ISIC 2016 training dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
S. M. A. Eslami
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC Segmentation dataset was utilized to train a network for the task of semantic image segmentation, specifically for lesion segmentation in dermatology.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC Segmentation

dcterms:description: The ISBI 2017 Challenge in Skin Lesion Analysis dataset was referenced for training a network for lesion classification, although specific details about the dataset were not provided.
dcterms:title: ISBI 2017 Challenge in Skin Lesion Analysis

dcterms:creator: K. He
X. Zhang
S. Ren
J. Sun
dcterms:description: ImageNet was used as a foundational dataset for training the Diagnosis Network, which is designed to classify images based on high-level concepts.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
